Product Description

Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen!

Whether you’re taking a road trip or commuting to work, if you have a family or spend a lot of time traveling from place to place in your car, having a car trash can is an easy way to keep your vehicle’s interior tidy. We’re all guilty of tossing crumpled-up napkins, crumbs, change into our cup holders. Avoid the buildup of trash with a Vankor car trash can! In order to meet the aesthetics of a wider range of car interior decoration styles and people, we have designed solid and floral pattern. Before launching these car trash bags, we thoroughly checked it for capacity, ease of installation, and additional features, including dual functionality as a car organizer. These auto trash bag will keep you organized and make it easier to throw out your garbage. Okay, Just start your travel now!

Car Trash Can with Lid

Soft lid to put the bottle and other car trash easily. Don’t worry about soiled by unfinished drinks.

Waterproof & Seamless Linning

100% leak-proof lining to ensure your car is dry & neat.

Adjustable Buckle & Strudy Stitching

Car trash bag hanging is designed for most car, trucks, minivans, campers; You can install easily it in somewhere of your car. Strudy Stitching to ensure it has a long service life.

As a Car Trash Can

It is easy to collect wrappers, receipts, and odds and ends in your car. For it to not look dirty and cluttered, keep a car trash can in your car.

As a Car Cooler

These car trash cans are even insulated, which means you can use them as a cooler when traveling to visit family.

As a Storage Bag

Having a garbage can in the car is the best way to storage snacks and food for the car.

Universal Compatibility

Make everywhere clean: the multifunction trash can not only make your car clean and tidy but also hold up lots of garbage or food at some situations like Family Gathering, Journey, Picnic, Camping, Short Trip, Beach and so on.

【KEEP YOUR CAR CLEAN】- Are you always bothered by the messy of the car interior? Vankor’s car trash can with lid will help you to solve this annoyance. This cute car trash can will be helpful for keeping your car clutter-free, ensuring you are in a good mood while driving. Large car trash can with an adjustable strap is hung on the gear shift, glove box, headrest. You can also display the hanging car trash bag on the floor, hanging on the back seat, co-driver seat, or any place in your car.
【MULTIPURPOSE STORAGE】- Vankor car garbage can is functional, you can put the car garbage into the main bag, there are 3 outer pouch pockets of garbage can for car that will be great to help storage. You can put tissue packs, wipes, snacks, umbrellas, and other little things that you need to keep in your car to avoid mess, and for easy access. In addition, the waterproof performance also achieves the automotive garbage cans an excellent storage bag when you are camping or picnicking.
【INTIMATE DESIGN & CAPACITY 】- There are 2 side clasps for fixing disposable bags, effectively preventing falling out. Car trash bags have about 2 .5 Gallons for storage of car garbage or other stuff. Car trash bin has 100% leak-proof PEVA thick lining, no spillages will happen and is easy to be cleaned. The extra-large opening is made of elastic soft rubber, very roomy and easier to put litter into the bag, and helps to keep trash from spilling.
【WIDE COMPATIBILITY 】– An thoughtful solution for people who have the need for car neat and car interior storage. Perfectly fits varieties of types of vehicles including sedans, SUVs, RVs, trucks, vans, minivans, boats, campers, taxis, buses, etc. Auto trash can for car is very sturdy and durable, has a long service life, and is very convenient to carry. The car trash can for the back seat is foldable, When you don’t need it, just fold it up without taking up any space.
【STRICT QUALITY CONTROL】- Our company specializes in the portable car trash can for car, and every product is strictly inspected before it goes to the Amazon warehouse. Waterproof car trash can’s pictures are shot with an HD camera to ensure the authenticity of the product colors and details. Vankor aims to provide customers with a better product experience of car trash can bags and offer effective solutions for you.


Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen!

Whether you’re taking a road trip or commuting to work, if you have a family or spend a lot of time traveling from place to place in your car, having a car trash can is an easy way to keep your vehicle’s interior tidy. item.description: Price: (as of – Details) WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)



WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.
HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick the tape fastener bars together. Fold the edge at least 4 times up and snap the buttons together. It can be adjusted to 3 different sizes to suit your needs.
DRAWSTRING TOP AND TAPE FASTENER BOTTOM: The top drawstring is made from nylon rope. You can easily adjust the opening size of the bag with the drawstring to dispose the garbage. The bottom of this bag is stitched left and right with two pieces of tape fastener bars. The tape fastener bottom makes emptying a breeze. Easy to clean and empty.
SNAP BUTTON STRAP: This car trash bag has a handle strap on top of the holder for you to hang them anywhere you like! There are two snap buttons on the strap. The strap is adjustable and allows you to hang it up or take it down hassle-free. The sturdy handle can be easily hung on car seat, armrest, headrest or anywhere inside your car or any other places that you deem fit.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL BAG: This car trash bag is the perfect solution to keep and organise your used plastic grocery bags. It also could also be used to store undergarments, socks, baby washcloths and bibs. It is the best solution for space saving. You can hang it anywhere in the kitchen, bedroom, storeroom or workshop.

4.5
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)

item.title: Garden DIY: 25 Fun-to-Make Projects for an Attractive and Productive Garden (CompanionHouse Books) Plans & Step-by-Step Instructions for a Compost Bin, Rain Barrel, Birdbath, Arbor, Trellis, and More
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make the most of your garden! 25 step-by-step projects that are easy to accomplish with only basic techniques and inexpensive materialsOver 600 photos and illustrations take you through every step and processCreate bee-friendly flower gardens, mason bee house, trellises, raised beds, cold frames, compost bins, birdbaths, garden gates, benches, and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:36 UTC – Details)

Make the most of your garden!

25 step-by-step projects that are easy to accomplish with only basic techniques and inexpensive materialsOver 600 photos and illustrations take you through every step and processCreate bee-friendly flower gardens, mason bee house, trellises, raised beds, cold frames, compost bins, birdbaths, garden gates, benches, and moreComplete plans, how-to photos, construction and painting tips, and a cut list, skill level, and time frame for each project

Get inspired to get your hands dirty with Garden DIY!

Packed with complete plans and easy-to-follow construction tips, Garden DIY offers a creative mix of both practical and decorative projects for any gardening enthusiast. These 25 fun and useful outdoor projects range from easy to intermediate to advanced, and each is handily color-coded to its skill level.

Inside this book, brother and sister team Samantha and Daniel Johnson present 25 hands-on projects for aspiring horticulturalists. From a potting bench, planter box, and trellis to compost bins, a brick birdbath, bird houses, and a mason bee lodge, these beginner-friendly projects come with clear step-by-step color photographs to guide you through each process.

The book begins with an introduction to the DIY mindset which explains the positive benefits and satisfaction of building things yourself. Then, you’ll find a helpful overview of the basic tools and skills you’ll need to complete each task, as well as helpful construction and painting tips. The included Project Directory provides each project’s estimated time required for completion and a skill level key, so you can easily find the projects that are right for you.

Inside Garden DIY, you’ll learn how to:

Plant potatoesBuild a rain barrelCreate a wheelbarrow gardenConstruct a compost binPlant a bee-centric gardenBuild a pergola garden swingMake a house for mason bees…and much more!

Get started creating the garden of your dreams, with Garden DIY!

“I’m an all thumbs guy, but Samantha and Daniel make these garden projects look so easy that I might take a run at building a new raised bed this weekend!”
—Todd Heft, Big Blog of Gardening

item.title: ARM & HAMMER Swivel Bin & Rake Pooper Scooper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) DOG POOPER SCOOPER WITH ADJUSTABLE HANDLE: The lightweight handle extends up to 32 inches, which prevents the need to bend, kneel or squat to pick up pet waste. No more breaking your back to bend down and scoop up dog poop with your hand and dog poop bag. Rake and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:49:29 UTC – Details)



DOG POOPER SCOOPER WITH ADJUSTABLE HANDLE: The lightweight handle extends up to 32 inches, which prevents the need to bend, kneel or squat to pick up pet waste. No more breaking your back to bend down and scoop up dog poop with your hand and dog poop bag. Rake and then lift the pan to contain waste.
NEXT LEVEL QUALITY: Arm and Hammer waste bags help keep your bin clean and provide natural odor control with activated baking soda.2x thicker than standard grocery bags and helps contain large quantities of pet waste. Less messy than a broom and dustpan set, perfect for your dog housebreaking supplies.
HEAVY DUTY BAGS: These poop bags are two times thicker than standard grocery bags. Fresh Scent along with activated baking soda help to neutralize foul odors while you work. The handle ties prevent touching the waste and keeps stink in while you are taking the dog poop bag out.
ARM & HAMMER, ODOR CONTROL YOU CAN TRUST: From waste bag dispensers and litter box wipes to litter pans, liners, scoops, and pet beds, Arm & Hammer has you and your pet covered with mess-fighting solutions that people know and trust. Refill bags are available for purchase separately.
HOW TO USE BAGS: Pull a single bag from the perforated section on the side of the package. Loop bag handles around molded hooks on side of the bin. When finished scooping, unhook bag handles, tie with easy-tie handles and dispose of properly. Questions or complaints, contact us as we are happy to help.

Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:49:29 UTC – Details)

An Amazon Brand.
Cross cut shredder turns paper into small pieces (0.2 x 1.9 inches; 5 x 47 mm); meets security level P-3 standards
Shreds up to 8 sheets of 20-pound bond paper at a time, including staples and small paper clips; 8.7-inch-wide entry
Destroys credit cards one at a time, through the dedicated slot
4 mode control switch (auto/on, off, reverse, forward) and LED status indicators for power on and overheat
3 minute runtime; 30 minute cool down; if runs beyond max run time, it automatically shuts off to prevent overheating
Handle for easily lifting up the shredder head when it’s time to empty the 4.1 gallon bin
Quality tested: as part of Amazon Basics quality inspections, we test every shredder before shipping it, which means you may see some paper shreds from the testing

Amazon Basics Cross-Cut Paper & Credit Card Shredders

Cross-Cut Shredder

More secure than a strip-cut shredder, this cross-cut shredder slices diagonally in both directions to destroy paper, credit cards and more.

Easy Start

In Auto (on) mode, shredding begins once the machine detects something to be shredded, and then it stops automatically when shredding is complete.

Reverse Function

The reverse function makes it possible to retrieve un-shredded or partially shredded documents, plus helps prevent paper jams.

Thermal Protection for Safety

The shredder will automatically shut off to protect the motor if it runs beyond its maximum run time or begins to over-heat.

Product Description

Accmor Compact Car Trash Can keeps your litter in one place and makes use of your car little space artfully. It takes up minimal amount of space yet creates you full garbage capacity, keep your car clean and tidy.

Easy to install and use

push to open effortlessly and close automatically, creating you more safe and environmental driving journey

Pakage Included

1*Black Car Garbage Can

1*Auto Trash Bag in Size about 11.8*11.8 inches

【Waterproof & Leak-proof:】Accmor Mini Trash Can for Car is made of durable waterproof plastic which provide maximum strength, durability, and longevity. Handy bounce cover design is convenience for you to put garbage into it effortlessly and ensure the trash can sealed well to avoid unpleasant odors from escaping into the car.
【Easy Installation】 The auto trash bin back with high-strength hook which make it easy to install. Can be hung on the edge of the door and the back seat, or placed in the central console.
【Compact Size, Large Capacity, Space Less,】Tiny but functional car garbage bin will maintain your vehicle clean and organized yet do not occupy too much space of the car.
【Multi-function】This tiny trash bin also can be used as a storage box for umbrella, drink bottle and other small objects or be used as an ashtray, cup holder or coins holder. Besides it can be used in office, living room, kitchen, bedroom, dining room
【Universal Fit】Our small trash can with perfect size fits for every type of vehicle, including cars, trucks, minivans, SUVs, RVs, campers, boats, semis, buses, cabs/taxis, and more!
